message: Starting independent review of Schema & Core Implementation phase - gathering task context and deliverables
Investigating agent outputs - no findings reported but 11 agents completed. Checking what they actually delivered
Verifying core implementation changes - state_db.py enhanced with lifecycle functions, real_mcp_server using state_db, dashboard API migrated to SQLite
CRITICAL FINDING: SQLite shows 22 active agents across 7 tasks including old tasks from October. Agents are NOT being marked terminal. Implementation incomplete - lifecycle transitions not working
Review complete: Phase needs revision. Schema enhanced and API migrated but agent lifecycle broken - 22 agents still 'active' from October. Core issue NOT fixed.
